title: Kerala 12 Year old girl RAPED by 30 people
content:
A 12-year-old girl was allegedly raped by around 30 people at Chelari in the district. It is suspected that the girl, who is a Class VII student, was raped with the support of her father. 

In connection with the incident, Tirurangadi police have filed a case under various sections of Protection of Children From Sexual Offences (Pocso) Act and arrested two people. The arrested have been identified as Ashraf, 36, son of Muhammed Kutty, a resident of Mele Chelari and Shyju, 38, son of Karuppan, a resident of Chenakkalanagdi. 

The issue came to light when local people alerted the PTA members of the school, where the girl was studying. The teachers, who observed the girl, found that she was frequently skipping classes and was mentally disturbed. Following this, school authorities informed Childline authorities and details of the sexual abuse were revealed when the childline volunteers counseled the girl.

 

 

The girl was produced before the Child Welfare Committee (CWC) Malappuram on Saturday and was sheltered at a children’s home in Malappuram. On Sunday, the Tirurangadi police registered the case and the survivor was produced before the magistrate to record her statement. 

(The victim's identity has not been revealed to protect her privacy as per Supreme Court directives on cases related to sexual assault) 

 

Source: http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/articleshow/71249890.cms

recommendations.title: All 4 accused in Hyderabad veterinarianâ€™s rape and murder case killed in a police encounter
recommendations.content:
Police have said all four accused in the rape and murder of the Hyderabad vet have been killed in an encounter. The accused were shot dead on the same highway where the body of the 26-year-old was found.

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Wayanad, Kalpetta, Kerala
recommendations.content: Wayanad is an Indian district in the north-east of Kerala state with administrative headquarters at the municipality of Kalpetta. It is set high on the Western Ghats with altitudes ranging from 700 to 2100 meters. The district was formed on 1 November 1980 as the 12th district in Kerala by carvin

recommendations.title: Top Places to visit in Alappuzha, Alleppey, Kerala
recommendations.content: Alappuzha, also known by its former name Alleppey, is the administrative headquarters of Alappuzha District in the Indian State of Kerala. Alappuzha is a city and a municipality in Kerala with an urban population of 174,164 and ranks third among the districts in literacy rate in the State of Kera
